publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5990 Angela Constance: 10th Anniversary of the West Lothian Community Rehabilitation and Brain Injury Service—That the Parliament congratulates the West Lothian Community Rehabilitation and Brain Injury Service (CRABIS) on its recently celebrated 10th anniversary; acknowledges the array of multidisciplinary rehabilitation services that CRABIS has offered since its beginning in January 2000; applauds the organisation for aligning itself within the West Lothian Community Health and Care Partnership, and commends the CRABIS staff for their diligence in providing for those whose lives have been affected by brain injuries. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Stuart McMillan*, Jackie Baillie*, Jim Hume*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*, Karen Whitefield*, Bill Kidd*, Mary Mulligan*
